Package main

Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
main.UserManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Manager
public class UserManager extends Object implements Manager
The UserManager of the application

Implements the Manager class

Helps application keep track of all the users and allows application to do several functionalities

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Aryan Jain
